c74object.name: rtt.clockin~

attribute.name: ppqn
attribute.digest: Number of pulses that make up one beat.

attribute.name: transportsync
attribute.digest: When enabled, reset the ramp’s phase to 0 whenever the transport changes from stopped to started.

attribute.name: barlength
attribute.digest: Number of beats per phasor ramp.

attribute.name: syncupdate
attribute.digest: When enabled, changes to parameters are deferred until the phasor wraps.

c74object.description: rtt.clockin~ allows you to convert pulse-based clock signals like those produced by some modular synths into a phasor ramp clock signal that’s useful within Max.
c74object.digest: Convert a trigger-based clock signal into a phasor-based one
